rules.text:
1. Untap and Draw
2. Main Phase
 - (If you have any) play a land card (1 per turn)
 - Play any cards you can afford
3. Combat Phase (Optional)
 - Declare Attackers
 - (Other player) Declare Blockers
 - Combat Damage Resolves
 4. Main Phase (Again)
 5. End of Your Turn

scryLabel1.text: Scry: Move these cards to either the top or bottom of your deck

scryLabel2.text: The card at the top of the top pile will be the next card you draw

scryWarning.text: Move all cards to Top or Bottom before confirming
